SELECT i.mark_id AS commId, i.`code` AS commCode, i.`name` AS commName, i.introduction, i.quantity, p.mark_id AS priceId, p.unit, IFNULL(p.min_point, 0) AS minPoint, IFNULL(p.max_point, 0) AS maxPoint, IFNULL(p.sale_price, 0) as salePrice, p.defaults, s.`name` AS specsName, cs.min_value AS min_value, cs.max_value AS max_value, ci.item_id AS itemId, si.`name` AS itemName, ci.markup_price AS markupPrice FROM t_category_commodity cc LEFT JOIN t_commodity_info i ON cc.commodity_id = i.mark_id LEFT JOIN t_commodity_price p ON i.mark_id = p.commodity_id LEFT JOIN t_commodity_item ci ON i.mark_id = ci.commodity_id AND ci.checked = 1 LEFT JOIN t_commodity_specs cs ON ci.commodity_id = cs.commodity_id AND cs.specs_id = ci.specs_id LEFT JOIN t_specs_info s ON ci.specs_id = s.mark_id LEFT JOIN t_specs_item si ON ci.item_id = si.mark_id AND ci.item_id = si.mark_id WHERE i.`status` <> -1 AND p.mark_id IS NOT NULL AND cc.category_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY cc.sort, convert(i.name using gbk), p.defaults DESC, p.create_time

SELECT i.mark_id AS commId, i.`code` AS commCode, i.`name` AS commName, i.introduction, i.quantity, (select GROUP_CONCAT(ii.image_path) from t_commodity_img ci LEFT JOIN db_base.t_image_info ii ON ii.mark_id = ci.img_id where ci.commodity_id = i.mark_id) AS imgs, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ii.image_path) FROM t_tag_commodity tc LEFT JOIN t_tag_info ti ON tc.tag_id = ti.mark_id LEFT JOIN db_base.t_image_info ii ON ii.mark_id = ti.img_id WHERE ti.`status` = 1 AND tc.commodity_id = i.mark_id) AS tagImgs, p.mark_id AS priceId, p.unit, IFNULL(p.min_point, 0) AS minPoint, IFNULL(p.max_point, 0) AS maxPoint, p.price_type as priceType, IFNULL(p.sale_price, 0) as salePrice, IFNULL(p.integral_price, 0) AS integralPrice, p.defaults, s.`name` AS specsName, cs.min_value AS min_value, cs.max_value AS max_value, ci.item_id AS itemId, si.`name` AS itemName, ci.markup_price AS markupPrice FROM t_category_commodity cc LEFT JOIN t_commodity_info i ON cc.commodity_id = i.mark_id LEFT JOIN (select mark_id, commodity_id, unit, min_point, max_point, price_type, sale_price, integral_price, defaults, create_time from t_commodity_price where price_type = 1 UNION select mark_id, commodity_id, unit, min_point, max_point, price_type, sale_price, integral_price, defaults, create_time from t_commodity_price where commodity_id not in (select commodity_id from t_commodity_price where price_type = 1)) p ON i.mark_id = p.commodity_id LEFT JOIN t_commodity_item ci ON i.mark_id = ci.commodity_id AND ci.checked = 1 LEFT JOIN t_commodity_specs cs ON ci.commodity_id = cs.commodity_id AND cs.specs_id = ci.specs_id LEFT JOIN t_specs_info s ON ci.specs_id = s.mark_id LEFT JOIN t_specs_item si ON ci.item_id = si.mark_id AND ci.item_id = si.mark_id WHERE i.`status` = 1 AND p.mark_id IS NOT NULL AND cc.category_id = #{cateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND i.store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY cc.sort, convert(i.name using gbk), p.defaults DESC, p.create_time
